translation.defences_not_applicable: Activated defences that are not applicable to this attack tree
translation.attack_tree_of_defences: Defences and effortless attacks in the attack tree
translation.skip_defences: Defences inside an effortless attack are skipped when calculating its parents values.
translation.unknown_attacknode_type: 'type' attribute must be set to 'or' or 'and'
translation.filter_with_wrong_type: Properties of type 'rationalScaleDefender' refer to the defender and therefore cannot be filtered, but can only be mentioned below 'enabledDefences'. The name of the affected property is
translation.filter_with_ignored_value: Specification of a value for filtering does not make sense when applied to a property of type 'boolean'. The name of the affected property is
translation.duplicate_type_declaration: duplicate type declaration of the property
translation.missing_type_declaration: missing type declaration of the property
translation.repeat_with_wrong_type: 'repeat' attribute contains a property with the inappropriate type
translation.no_defence: The attack can be performed effortlessly, because there is no defence. In order to change that, write the value of the 'defence' attribute below 'enabledDefences'.
translation.no_defence_create_attribute: Create a 'defence' attribute for the property first.
translation.defence_would_be_in_vain: The attack would be effortless even with the defence enabled. So we disable it here.
translation.deterrence_hint: Remove or decrease the respective value below 'filter' in order to change that.
translation.by_hint: The value on the right originates from these attack nodes.
translation.missing_value_hint: You may want to add a value for the property in the respective subgoal.
translation.attacknode_without_type: ERROR: Type of attacknode from XML file is required to set the default value.
translation.greater_than_one: WARNING: Probabilities greater than 100% do not make sense.
translation.warn_default: WARNING: No value specified in the XML file. Using default.
translation.reserved_property: ERROR: Attempt to assign a value to the reserved property
translation.reserved_property_type: ERROR: The reserved property must be of type boolean
